title: HTML Forms
description: Learn to create simple forms with input fields, labels, and a submit button.

examples.output: A form with Name and Email fields and a submit button.

constraints: Include at least one text input.
Form must have a submit button.
starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>Form Example</title>
</head>
<body>
  <!-- Build your form here -->
</body>
</html>
hints: Always include <input type='submit'> to send the form.
